title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Reinforcement Learning-Based Vehicle Position Control Design in Urban Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand multipath interference phenomena occurring in urban environments and reproduce them in simulation settings.
A reinforcement learning-based feedback control system can be designed to stably position a vehicle at a target point
Optimal control policies can be derived in scenarios where vehicle dynamics are unknown by utilizing offline policy learning (Off-policy Reinforcement Learning)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
